## Bumblin' Bee 🐝

  &nbsp;
  
<p class="blocktext">Bumblin’ Bee bobbles</p>
<p class="blocktext">‘bout bouncin’,</p>
<p class="blocktext">blurry blossoms.</p>

  &nbsp;

<p class="blocktext">Being bashful but bold</p> 
<p class="blocktext">by bumblin’ brightly,</p>
<p class="blocktext">Blarin’ bumpin’ beauty.</p> 

  &nbsp;

<p class="blocktext">Bustling busily,</p>
<p class="blocktext">but beaming</p>
<p class="blocktext">by bumblin’ benignly,</p>
<p class="blocktext">Bringing bliss</p>
<p class="blocktext">‘bout built blight.</p>

  &nbsp;

<p class="blocktext">Bumblin’ bound by being,</p>
<p class="blocktext">bound by love.</p>

  &nbsp;

## [The Mulberry Tree](https://issuu.com/windhoverncsu/docs/final___issuu__1_/34)
###### Published in Windhover Vol. LIV 

  &nbsp;

---
  
  &nbsp;
  
## Truth Lies

  &nbsp;

<p class="blocktext2">The truth lies</p>
<p class="blocktext2">Not in books bound with leather,</p>
<p class="blocktext2">But by belief</p>
<p class="blocktext2">In your eyes and mine.</p>

  &nbsp;

<p class="blocktext2">And though perceived</p>
<p class="blocktext2">To lead the way,</p>
<p class="blocktext2">It may leave</p>
<p class="blocktext2">The heart deceived.</p>

  &nbsp;

<p class="blocktext2">For your truth</p>
<p class="blocktext2">Is a vase of expired roses,</p>
<p class="blocktext2">And mine</p>
<p class="blocktext2">A map of no scale.</p>
<p class="blocktext2">        (I am lost without it.)</p>

  &nbsp;

<p class="blocktext2">A teary-eyed wanderer seeking</p>
<p class="blocktext2">Opaque meaning</p>
<p class="blocktext2">Finds it so</p>
<p class="blocktext2">Fleeting,</p>

  &nbsp;

<p class="blocktext2">Despite</p>
<p class="blocktext2">The question</p> 
<p class="blocktext2">Still beckoning:</p>
<p class="blocktext2">Where does the truth lie?</p>
